forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 26F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will transition to snow showers late. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 20F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 11F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low -8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low around 20F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: On and off snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
